mapper.sql: id, name, alarm_time, score, level, advice, alarm_content, url, keyword, taskId, alarm_type, userId, group_id, serviceId, districtId
mapper.select: select id, name, DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') alarm_time, level, advice, alarm_content, url, keyword, serviceId, districtId from cs_alarm where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,DATE_FORMAT(o.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') begin_date, DATE_FORMAT(o.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') end_date, DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') create_date,o.scan_type,o.status from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id AND o.status =2

select.if:
SELECT tw.* FROM cs_order_asset oa ,cs_task t,cs_taskwarn tw WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id AND (t.taskId=tw.task_id or t.group_id=tw.group_id)
limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize}

mapper.insert: insert into cs_alarm (id, name, alarm_time, score, level, advice, alarm_content, url, keyword, taskId, alarm_type, userId, group_id, serviceId, districtId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, #{advice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{districtid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into cs_alarm
id, name, alarm_time, score, level, advice, alarm_content, url, keyword, taskId, alarm_type, userId, group_id, serviceId, districtId,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, #{advice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{alarmType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{districtid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update cs_alarm
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
score = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT},
advice = #{advice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_content = #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskId = #{taskid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=CHAR},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serviceId = #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
districtId = #{districtid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cs_alarm set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, score = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, advice = #{advice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_content = #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskId = #{taskid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=CHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serviceId = #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, districtId = #{districtid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
